verbs.description: < p > [ARG1: President Donald Trump] [V: is] [ARGM-NEG: n't] [ARG2: shy about voicing his dislike for the media] but he took his disdain a step further Friday morning by holding a restricted press briefing.</p >
< p > [ARG0: President Donald Trump] is n't shy about [V: voicing] [ARG1: his dislike for the media] but he took his disdain a step further Friday morning by holding a restricted press briefing.</p >

< p > President Donald Trump is n't shy about voicing his dislike for the media but [ARG0: he] [V: took] [ARG1: his disdain] [ARG2: a step further] [ARGM-TMP: Friday morning] [ARGM-MNR: by holding a restricted press] briefing.</p >
< p > President Donald Trump is n't shy about voicing his dislike for the media but [ARG0: he] took his disdain a step further Friday morning by [V: holding] [ARG1: a restricted press] briefing.</p >
< p > President Donald Trump is n't shy about voicing his dislike for the media but he took his disdain a step further Friday morning by holding a [V: restricted] [ARG1: press] briefing.</p >
< p > President Donald Trump is n't shy about voicing his dislike for the media but he took his disdain a step further Friday morning by holding a [ARG1: restricted press] [V: briefing.</p] >
